Tooltip: The reporting period the dataset belongs to (e.g. fiscal year).
Does the fiscal year deviate from the calendar year?
The date at which the fiscal year ends.
Are all Group legal entities covered in the reports?
Guidance/Comment: We expect that in the most cases Value should be "Yes".

Tooltip: Activity level disclosure
Total number of employees (including temporary workers with assignment duration >6 months)
Is the NFRD mandatory for your company?
Level of assurance of the EU Taxonomy disclosure (Reasonable Assurance, Limited Assurance, None)
Expected value: Text: Reasonable Assurance or Limited Assurance or None

Guidance/Comment: The primary way of aggregating from an economic activity to a company level. Some companies may need to aggregate from asset to economic activity level.
Cross-check indicators: a) check with the value of Revenue line from Profit and Loss Consolidated Financial Statement b) check with the value from other source/database (Capital IQ) c) find the same value in the other report of a company (Annual report, Integrated report, Sustainablity report) d) avarage revenue growth for the last 3-5 years in comparison with the reporting period growth (historical revenue for calculation are taken from third-party source/database (Capital IQ)

Guidance/Comment: Percentage: Numerator - Revenues derived from products and/or services associated with EU taxonomy eligible activities. Denominator- Revenues accounted for in the Consolidated Income Statement under IFRS.

Cross-check indicators: <= Eligible Revenue, <= Total Revenue, <= Use of Proceeds (Green Bond Principles)
